snippet: In the second embarrassing episode for the Secret Service this week, a uniformed officer was charged on Friday with attempted burglary and destruction of property.
abstract: Secret Service Officer Arthur Baldwin is suspended following his arrest on first-degree attempted burglary charges.
lead_paragraph: In the second embarrassing episode for the Secret Service this week, a uniformed officer was charged on Friday with attempted burglary and destruction of property.

headline.main: Secret Service Officer Faces Charges in Break-In
headline.print_headline: Service Officer Faces Charges in a Break-In
